summary: Berachain v2 Bartio is now Live - Started as an NFT project for fun in the DeFi ecosystem. Made the NFTs rebase and grew a massive cult community. Identified major gaps in protocol level alignment between liquidity and security. Raised VC from some of the best firms in the game. Launched a chain 🚀 🚀 🚀. BeaconKit is a high-performance, EVM-indentical blockchain SDK enabling the development of modular L1 blockchain.
